content: i have been knitting ribbed baby hats for around 6 years now because they are so stretchy they are very practical and they seem to fit for ages i have now added new sizes for babies toddlers and young children too great hats for boys or girls requires dk yarn 4mm needles a pom-pom if desired knit them as a beanie style hat - or add more row if you prefer a turned-up brim and add a pom-pom if you like these hats look great knitted in a plain self-coloured yarn or with a variegated yarn you choose **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
